name: Bugged (Leith Reardon)
description:
A standard 2D platformer where everything is intentional and nothing goes wrong! Play this normal game that has been bug tested to ensure it functions properly. 

Players might experience some strange things but these are likely due to errors on your own machine and nothing on the creator's part. 

Controls:  

Use arrow keys or the A and D key to move left and right. Use space to jump.  

Press escape to open the pause menu (this is a mechanic used to beat a level so make sure to press it in level 3!) 

Credits:

Geremy Delgado: Programmer/Glitch Creator

Brianna Geck: Enemy/Terrain Artist

 Nick Paterno: Background/UI Artist

Leith Reardon: Programmer/Level Design/Sound
